synopsis.text:
Yoshino Sakura returns to the enchanting island of Hatsunejima, where cherry blossoms bloom perpetually, and dreams intertwine with reality. After six years in America, she's back to fulfill a childhood promise made to her cousin, Asakura Jun'ichi. Unbeknownst to many, Jun'ichi possesses a unique ability: he can see other people's dreams and create sweets out of thin air.

Jun'ichi shares a close bond with his adopted sister, Nemu, and together they navigate the magical world around them. Attending Kazami Academy, their circle of friends includes a budding J-pop idol, Kotori, and the quirky Mizukoshi sisters, Moe and Mako.

As Sakura's return stirs up old emotions and resurfaces long-forgotten promises, Jun'ichi's once peaceful life is disrupted. The line between dreams and reality blurs, and the lives of everyone around him are set on a course for change. Amidst the chaos, Jun'ichi must confront his feelings for the girls in his life and unravel the mysteries of the island, where love, magic, and dreams intertwine.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
